Verses: 1 irandu Varusham Sendrapinbu, Paarvon Oru Soppanam Kandaan; Adhu Ennavendraal, Avan Nadhiyandaiyile Nindrukondirundhaan.
2 appozhudhu Azhagum Pushtiyumaana Ezhu Pasukkal Nadhiyilirundhu Erivandhu Pul Meyndhadhu.
3 avaigalinpin Avalatchanamum Kevalamumaana Vere Ezhu Pasukkal Nadhiyilirundhu Erivandhu, Nadhi Oraththil Matrap Pasukkalandaiyile Nindradhu.
4 avalatchanamum Kevalamumaana Pasukkal Azhagum Pushtiyumaana Ezhu Pasukkalaiyum Patchiththuppottadhu; Ippadip Paarvon Kandu Vizhiththukkondaan.
5 marubadiyum Avan Niththiraiseydhu, Irandaam Visai Oru Soppanam Kandaan; Nalla Sezhumaiyaana Ezhu Kadhirgal Ore Thaalilirundhu Ongi Valarndhadhu.
6 pinbu, Saaviyaanadhum Keezhkaatrinaal Theeyndhadhumaana Ezhu Kadhirgal Mulaiththadhu.
7 saaviyaana Kadhirgal Sezhumaiyum Niraimeniyumaana Andha Ezhu Kadhirgalaiyum Vizhungippottadhu; Appozhudhu Paarvon Vizhiththukkondu, Adhu Soppanam Endru Arindhaan.

8 kaalame Paarvonudaiya Manam Kalakkamkondirundhadhu; Appozhudhu Avan Egipthilulla Sagala Mandhiravaadhigalaiyum Sagala Saasthirigalaiyum Azhaippiththu, Avargalukkuth Than Soppanaththaich Sonnaan; Oruvaraalum Adhin Arththaththaip Paarvonukkuch Sollak Koodaamalpoyitru.
9 appozhudhu Paanapaaththirakkaararin Thalaivan Paarvonai Nokki: Naan Seydha Kutram Indrudhaan En Ninaivil Vandhadhu.
10 paarvon Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaararmel Kadungobamgondu, Ennaiyum Suyampaakigalin Thalaivanaiyum Thalaiyaarigalin Adhipadhi Veetaagiya Siraichchaalaiyile Vaiththirundha Kaalaththil,
11 naanum Avanum Ore Iraaththiriyile Vevveru Porulkonda Soppanam Kandom.

12 appozhudhu Thalaiyaarigalin Adhibadhikku Velaikkaaranaakiya Ebireya Pillaiyaandaan Oruvan Ange Engalode Irundhaan; Avanidaththil Avaigalaich Sonnom, Avan Naangal Kanda Soppanangalukkuriya Vevveru Arththaththinpadiye Engal Soppanaththin Payanaich Sonnaan.
13 avan Engalukkuch Solliya Arththaththindadiye Nadandhadhu; Ennaith Thirumba En Nilaiyile Niruththi, Avanaith Thookkippotuviththaar Endraan.
14 appozhudhu Paarvon Yoseppai Azhaippiththaan; Avanaith Theeviramaaik Kaavalkidangilirundhu Konduvandhaargal. Avan Sanaam Pannikkondu, Veru Vasthiram Thariththu, Paarvonidaththil Vandhaan.

15 paarvon Yoseppai Nokki: Oru Soppanam Kanden; Adhin Arththaththaich Solla Oruvarum Illai; Nee Oru Soppanaththaik Kettaal, Adhin Arththaththaich Solluvaai Endru Unnaikkuriththu Naan Kelvippatten Endraan.
16 appozhudhu Yoseppu Paarvonukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Naan Alla, Dhevane Paarvonukku Mangalamaana Uththaravu Aruliseyvaar Endraan,
17 paarvon Yoseppai Nokki: En Soppanaththile, Naan Nadhi Oraththil Nindrukondirundhen.
18 azhagum Pushtiyumaana Ezhu Pasukkal Nadhiyilirundhu Erivandhu Pulmeyndhadhu.
19 avaigalinpin Ilaiththadhum Magaa Avalatchanamum Kevalamumaana Vere Ezhu Pasukkal Erivandhadhu; Ivaigalaippola Avalatchanamaana Pasukkalai Egipthu Dhesamengum Naan Kandadhillai.
20 kevalamum Avalatchanamumaana Pasukkal Kozhumaiyaana Mundhina Ezhu Pasukkalaiyum Patchiththuppottadhu.
21 avaigal Ivaigalin Vayitrukkul Poyum, Vayitrukkul Poyitrendru Thondraamal, Mun Irundhadhu Polave Avalatchanamaayirundhadhu; Ippadik Kandu Vizhiththukkonden.
22 pinnum Naan En Soppanaththile, Niraimeniyulla Ezhu Lla Kadhirgal Ore Thaalilirundhu Ongi Valarakkanden.
23 pinbu Saaviyaanavaigalum Keezhkaatrinaal Theeyndhu Padharaanavaigalumaana Ezhu Kadhirgal Mulaiththadhu.
24 saaviyaana Kadhirgal Andha Ezhu Nalla Kadhirgalaiyum Vizhungippottadhu. Idhai Mandhiravaadhikalidaththil Sonnen; Idhin Porulai Enakku Viduvikkiravan Oruvanum Illai Endraan.
25 appozhudhu Yoseppu Paarvonai Nokki: Paarvonin Soppanam Ondru Thaan; Dhevan Thaam Seyyappogiradhu Innadhendru Paarvonukku Ariviththirukkiraar.
26 andha Ezhu Nalla Pasukkalum Ezhu Varushamaam; Andha Ezhu Nalla Kadhirkalum Ezhu Varushamaam; Soppanam Ondre.
27 avaigalinpin Erivandha Kevalamum Avalatchanamumaana Ezhu Pasukkalum Ezhu Varushamaam; Keezhkaatrinaal Theeyndhu Saaviyaana Ezhu Kadhirgalum Ezhu Varushamaam; Ivaigal Panjamulla Ezhu Varushamaam.
28 paarvonukku Naan Sollavendiya Kaariyam Idhuve; Dhevan Thaam Seyyappokiradhaip Paarvonukkuk Kaanbiththirukkiraar.
29 egipthu Dhesamengum Paripooranamaana Vilaivu Undaayirukkum Ezhu Varusham Varum.
30 adhanpin Panjamundaayirukkum Ezhu Varusham Varum; Appozhudhu Egipthudhesaththil Andhap Paripooranamellaam Marakkappattuppogum; Andhap Panjam Dhesaththaip Paazhaakkum.
31 varappogira Magaa Kodumaiyaana Panjaththaal Dhesaththil Munnirundha Paripooranamellaam Ozhindhupom.
32 indhak Kaariyam Dhevanaal Nichchayikkappattirukkiradhu Enbadhaiyum, Dhevan Idhaich Seekkiraththil Seyvaar Enbadhaiyum Kurikkumporuttu, Indhach Soppanam Paarvonukku Irattithdhadhu.
33 aagaiyaal, Vivegamum Gnaanamumulla Oru Manushanaith Thedi, Avanai Egipthudhesaththukku Adhigaariyaagap Paarvon Erpaduththuvaaraaga.
34 ippadip Paarvon Seydhu, Dhesaththinmel Visaaranaikkaararai Vaiththu, Paripooranamulla Ezhu Varushangalil Egipthudhesaththile Vilaiyum Vilaichchalil Aindhil Oru Pangai Vaangumpadi Seyvaaraaga,

35 avargal Varappogira Nalla Varushangalil Vilaiyum Dhaaniyangalaiyellaam Serththu, Pattanangalil Aagaaram Undaayirukkumpadikku, Paarvonudaiya Adhigaaraththukkullaagath Dhaaniyangalaip Baththirappaduththi Vaiththuvaippaargalaaga.
36 dhesam Panjaththinaal Azhindhupogaadhabadikku, Andhath Dhaaniyam Ini Egipthudhesaththil Undaakum Panjamulla Ezhu Varushangalukkaaga Dhesaththirku Oru Vaippaayiruppadhaaga Endraan.
37 indha Vaarththai Paarvonudaiya Paarvaikkum Avan Oozhiyakkaarar Ellaarudaiya Paarvaikkum Nandraaik Kandadhu.
38 appozhudhu Paarvon Than Oozhiyakkaararai Nokki: Dheva Aaviyaip Petra Indha Manushanaippola Veroruvan Undo Endraan.
39 pinbu, Paarvon Yoseppai Nokki: Dhevan Ivaiyellaavatraiyum Unakku Velippaduththiyirukkirabadiyaal, Unnaippola Vivegamum Gnaanamumullavan Veroruvanum Illai.
40 nee En Aramanaikku Adhigaariyaayiruppaai; Un Vaakkinbadiye En Janangal Ellaarum Adangi Nadakkakkadavargal; Singaasanaththil Maaththiram Unnilum Naan Periyavanaai Iruppen Endraan.
41 pinnum Paarvon Yoseppai Nokki: Paar, Egipthudhesam Muzhumaikkum Unnai Adhigaariyaakkinen Endru Solli,
42 paarvon Than Kaiyil Pottirundha Than Muththirai Modhiraththaik Kazhatri, Adhai Yoseppin Kaiyile Pottu, Melliya Vasdhirangalai Avanukku Uduththi, Pon Sarappaniyai Avan Kazhuththile Thariththu,
43 thannudaiya Irandaam Iradhaththinmel Avanai Etri, Thendanittup Paniyungal Endru Avanukku Munbaagak Kooruviththu, Egipthudhesam Muzhumaikkum Avanai Adhigaariyaakkinaan;
44 pinnum Paarvon Yoseppai Nokki: Naan Paarvon; Aanaalum Egipthudhesaththilullavargalil Oruvanum Un Uththaravillaamal Than Kaiyaiyaavadhu Than Kaalaiyaavadhu Asaikkakkoodaadhu Endraan.

45 melum, Paarvon Yoseppukku Saapnaadhpanneyaa Engira Peyaraiyittu; On Pattanaththu Aasaariyanaagiya Poththipiraavin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Aasnaaththai Avanukku Manaiviyaagak Koduththaan. Yoseppu Egipthudhesaththaich Sutrippaarkkumbati Purappattaan.
46 yoseppu Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Paarvonukku Munbaaga Nirkumbodhu Muppadhu Vayadhaayirundhaan; Yoseppu Paarvonudaiya Sannidhiyilirundhu Purappattu, Egipthudhesam Engum Poich Sutrippaarththaan.
47 paripooranamulla Ezhu Varushangalilum Boomi Mikudhiyaana Palanaik Koduththadhu.

48 avvezhu Varushangalil Egipthudhesaththil Vilaindha Dhaaniyangalaiyellaam Avan Serththu, Andhath Dhaaniyangalaip Pattanangalil Kattivaiththaan; Andhandhap Pattanaththil Adhinadhin Sutruppuraththuth Dhaaniyangalaik Kattivaiththaan.
49 ippadi Yoseppu Alavirandhadhaaik Kadarkarai Manalaippola Mikudhiyaaga Dhaaniyaththaich Serththuvaiththaan; Adhu Alavukku Adangaadhadhaayirundhadhu.
50 panjamulla Varushangal Varuvadharku Munne Yoseppukku Irandu Kumaarar Pirandhaargal; Avargalai On Pattanaththu Aasaariyanaagiya Poththipiraavin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Aasnaaththu Avanukkup Petraal.
51 yoseppu: En Varuththam Yaavaiyum En Thagappanudaiya Kutumbam Anaiththaiyum Naan Marakkumbati Dhevan Panninaar Endru Solli, Mooththavanukku Manaase Endru Perittaan.
52 naan Sirumaippattirundha Dhesaththil Dhevan Ennaip Palugappanninaar Endru Solli, Ilaiyavanukku Eppiraayeem Endru Perittaan.
53 egipthudhesaththil Vandha Paripooranamulla Ezhu Varushangalum Mudindhapin,
54 yoseppu Solliyabati Ezhuvarusha Panjam Thodanginadhu; Sagaladhesangalilum Panjam Undaayitru; Aanaalum Egipthudhesamengum Aagaaram Irundhadhu.

55 egipthudhesamengum Panjam Undaanapodhu, Janangal Unavukkaagap Paarvonai Nokki Olamittaargal; Adharkup Paarvon: Neengal Yoseppinidaththukkup Poi, Avan Ungalukkuch Sollugirabadi Seyyungal Endru Egipthiyar Ellaarukkum Sonnaan.
56 dhesamengum Panjam Undaanabadiyaal, Yoseppu Kalanjiyangalaiyellaam Thirandhu, Egipthiyarukku Vitraan; Panjam Egipthudhesaththil Varavarakkodidhaayitru.
57 kala Dhesangalilum Panjam Kodidhaayirundhabadiyaal, Sagala Dhesaththaargalum Yoseppinidaththil Dhaaniyam Kollumbadi Egipthukku Vandhaargal.
